Effect.en: If your opponent Special Summons a monster(s) face-up: You can discard this card, then target 1 of those face-up monsters; negate its effects until the end of this turn, also if that face-up monster leaves the field this turn, the player who controlled it takes damage equal to its original ATK. You can only use this effect of "Evening Crescent & Autumn Shower" once per turn.
